movies.title: The Blue Yonder
movies.plot: Have you ever thought of traveling through time...going forward or backward to any date? That's the intriguing question aviator/inventor Max Knickerbocker (E.T.'s Peter Coyote) asks Jonathan Knicks (Huckleberry Fox of "Terms of Endearment"). Max is unaware that Jonathan is his grandson - already an adventurous time traveler thanks to a machine built by his neighbor, Henry Coogan (Academy Award-winner actor Art Carney). Can Jonathan save his grandfather from a fatal solo flight across the Atlantic and alter the course of history?
movies.simplePlot: Have you ever thought of traveling through time...going forward or backward to any date? That's the intriguing question aviator/inventor Max Knickerbocker (E.T.'s Peter Coyote) asks ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Peter Coyote was born on October 10, 1941 in Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA as Rachmil Pinchus Ben Mosha Cohon. He is an actor, known for E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982), A Walk to Remember (2002) and Sphere (1998). He was previously married to Stefanie Pleet and Marilyn McCann.
biography.name: Peter Coyote

biography.bio: Huckleberry Fox was born on October 6, 1974 as George Miller Fox. He is an actor, known for Terms of Endearment (1983), The Blue Yonder (1985) and Konrad (1985). He has been married to Leah since October 2000. They have one child.
biography.name: Huckleberry Fox

biography.bio: Art Carney was born on November 4, 1918 in Mount Vernon, New York, USA as Arthur William Matthew Carney. He was an actor, known for Harry and Tonto (1974), The Late Show (1977) and Last Action Hero (1993). He was married to Jean Wilson Myers (remarried), Barbara Carney and Jean Wilson Myers. He died on November 9, 2003 in Chester, Connecticut, USA.
biography.name: Art Carney

biography.bio: Leading and supporting actor Dennis Lipscomb has been appearing in films since the early eighties. Trained as a Shakespearian stage actor, Lipscomb first starring role was the lead in Union City (1980), a film about the 1930s with mobsters and Nazi criminals. After co-starring in Love Child (1982), he took other lead roles in the ghost story Eyes of Fire (1983) and the thriller, Retribution (1988) in 1988. But Lipscomb's more significant roles have included him in supporting parts in major motion pictures including WarGames (1983), A Soldier's Story (1984), Crossroads (1986), The First Power (1990), and Steven Seagal's action hit film Piège en haute mer (1992).
biography.name: Dennis Lipscomb

biography.bio: Joe Flood is an actor, known for A View to a Kill (1985), Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult (1994) and Student Bodies (1981).
biography.name: Joe Flood

biography.bio: Mittie Smith is an actress, known for The Right Stuff (1983) and The Blue Yonder (1985).
biography.name: Mittie Smith

biography.bio: Frank Simons was born as Frank Joseph Simons. He is an actor, known for The Blue Yonder (1985), Soccer Dog: European Cup (2004) and The Orlando Jones Show (2003).
biography.name: Frank Simons

biography.bio: Stu Klitsner was born as Stuart P. Klitsner. He is an actor, known for The Pursuit of Happyness (2006), The Dead Pool (1988) and Time After Time (1979).
biography.name: Stu Klitsner

biography.bio: Morgan Upton was born on August 11, 1930 in Massachusetts, USA as Richard Morgan Upton. He was an actor, known for The Candidate (1972), Peggy Sue Got Married (1986) and Sudden Impact (1983). He died on December 22, 1991 in San Francisco, California, USA.
biography.name: Morgan Upton

biography.bio: Bennett Cale is an actor, known for Doing Time on Maple Drive (1992), The Blue Yonder (1985) and Who's the Boss? (1984). He was previously married to Paula Cale.
biography.name: Bennett Cale

biography.bio: Cyril Clayton is an actor, known for The Blue Yonder (1985), Light Blast (1985) and Midnight Caller (1988).
biography.name: Cyril Clayton

biography.bio: Charles Adams is an actor, known for Curly Sue (1991), Antarctica (1983) and The Blue Yonder (1985).
biography.name: Charles Adams

biography.bio: Gretchen Grant is an actress and writer, known for Class Action (1991), The Blue Yonder (1985) and Baby Snatcher (1992).
biography.name: Gretchen Grant

biography.bio: Doug Morrison is an actor, known for The Blue Yonder (1985) and Nash Bridges (1996).
biography.name: Doug Morrison

biography.bio: Jerry Landis is an actor, known for The Blue Yonder (1985).
biography.name: Jerry Landis
